Translations.Text: Nie equal som sedentary believers nie handicapped those strive zapricinit GOD ich peniaze ich zivot. GOD exalts strivers ICH PENIAZE ICH ZIVOT above the sedentary. both GOD promises salvation GOD exalts strivers sedentary velky recompense
higher ranks pojdem Him i mat rad forgiveness zlutovanie. GOD bol Forgiver Merciful

Those zivot zakoncit angels chvila statny z zlo ich souls angels ziadat them Co bol the zalezitost ona? They say My oppressed zem. They say Je GOD's zem nie spacious enough ona emigrate therein? these zaverecny abode bol Hell chudobny destiny
Exempted som chaby clovek zensky dieta nie possess strength nor znamenat zalozit way
These pardoned GOD GOD bol Pardoner Forgiver

Ktokolvek emigrates zapricinit z GOD will zalozit zem velka bounties richness! Ktokolvek dat up jeho domov emigrating GOD Jeho posol potom smrt zastihnut up s him jeho recompense rezervovat GOD GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
When ona cestovat during vojnovy ona nie commit omyl shortening tvoj Zmluva Prayers (Salat) ona fear ze disbelievers zachvatit ona! Iste disbelievers bol tvoj zapalisty enemies
